column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My grandpa needed help recently planting a bunch of apple trees on his property .
#text=After going to the nursery , we picked a perfect place for them to go and made sure to place them the appropriate distance apart .
#text=We grabbed the shovels he had in his shed and started digging the holes .
#text=After digging them all out , we carefully placed them into their spots and made sure to give them plenty of room and filled the hole with nutrients and very fresh soil .
#text=We made sure to give the newly planted trees plenty of water so that they would establish their roots very quickly and grow into very healthy trees .
#text=The first stage of planting a tree is the most important and we wanted to make sure to do it right .
#text=After we were done , we put all of our tools back and looked at our hard work .
#text=It was a fun experience and the trees ended up growing beautifully .
